sn.yandakakugadzirirai: which i have prepared for you
sn.yandichapiwa: which will be given to me
sn.yatakazarurirwa: it has been revealed to us
sn.yavamanahati: of those who do not know
sn.yavasingatendi: of those who do not believe
sn.zvaaizotaura: what he was going to say
sn.zvaakutadzira: what he has done to you
sn.zvakandibatsireiko: what did it do for me
sn.zvamakadanirwa: what you were called to do
sn.zvamakaitirwa: what has been done to you
sn.zvamakandibereka: what you gave birth to me
sn.zvamakandiitira: what you have done for me
sn.zvamakatarirwa: what you are expected to do
sn.zvamakatitongera: what you have judged us for
sn.zvamuchapiwa: what will be given to you
sn.zvandakarayirwa: what i was instructed to do
sn.zvandichaitirwa: what will be done to me
sn.zvandichakuitirawo: what i will do for you
sn.zvataitirwa: what has been done to us
sn.zvatakakwanisa: what we were able to do
sn.zvatingasimbisana: what we can strengthen each other
sn.zvavachaitirwawo: what will be done to them
sn.zvavakatemerwawo: what they were also determined to do
sn.zvavakatongwa: what they have already been judged
sn.zvavangapomerwa: what they may be accused of
sn.zvawaitirwa: what has been done to you
sn.zvawakandiitira: what you have done for me
sn.zvawakatarirwa: what you are expected to do
sn.zvawandimukira: what he has rebelled against me
sn.zvawatemerwa: what has been decreed for you
sn.zvawatondiita: what you have already done to me
sn.zvichakuitai: what will it do to you
sn.zvichakunakirai: it will be good for you
sn.zvichavanakira: it will be good for them
sn.zvichavaringana: it will be enough for them
sn.zvichingoitwa: as soon as it is done
sn.zvikasatomboitika: if it doesn't happen at all
sn.zvinondibatsirei: what does it do for me
sn.zvokusazomukazve: so as not to rise again
